  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15604</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">I diritti nell'Unione Europea</string>
            <string language="en">Rights in the European Union</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechte im europäischen Anschluß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Droites dans l'union européenne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direitas na união européia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δικαιώματα στην Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las derechas en la unión europea</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Imparare e capire i diritti dei cittadini europei.</string>
            <string language="en">Learning and understanding the rights of European citizens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernen und die Rechte der europäischen Bürger 
verstehend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude et arrangement les droites des citoyens 
européens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprendendo e compreendendo as direitas de 
cidadãos europeus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκμάθηση και κατανόηση των δικαιωμάτων των ευρωπαϊκών
πολιτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprendiendo y entendiendo las derechas de 
ciudadanos europeos.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <learningResourceType>

          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-18</string>
            <string language="en">12-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">I diritti nell'Unione Europea possono essere analizzati stimolando esempi concreti da parte degli studenti. Situazioni di role-play possono essere create dagli studenti. Ogni diritto può essere scritto e illustrato.</string>
            <string language="en">Rights in the EU can be explored while elliciting concrete examples from students.
Role-play situations can be made up by students.
Each Right can be written and illustrated.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
